title: Drawing, Decoration Project: Six Tondi with Sacrificial Gods and Two Victories, 1805
title_raw: Decoration Project: Six Tondi with Sacrificial Gods and Two Victories
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink: vittoria 1 vittoria; Giani 2 Giano e Pace; Ercole 3 Ercole e ninfa; minerva e storia; Giove 7 Giove Faretro; vittoria 4 vittoria; saturno 8 saturno e ninfe; vest 9 o vesta o sua sacrerdotessa
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Decoration Project: Six Tondi with Sacrificial Gods and Two Victories, 1805. Pen and brown ink, brush with brown wash over cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3476.
